title: Episode CLXXXIV: The FAME BALL
body_text:
"For two thousand, one hundred, sixty nine agonizing days,
the
East Coast Dodgeball
empire has been in a state of civil war."
STAR WARS
is the 184th
East Coast Dodgeball
event produced within the "Tronolone Era." It is scheduled to take place on August 13, 2011 at the Wall High School tennis courts in Wall, New Jersey. There is currently one attraction announced for the event.
PRODUCTION
STAR WARS will feature one main event that involves members of the current
East Coast Dodgeball
roster from existing rivalries partly initiated by embellished storylines. Dodgeball players will portray as themselves in an intensified manner as they follow through a series of outings that build tension and culminate in a duel, commonly known as a "captains match."
SCHEDULED MATCH
Justin Pierce, Valerie Winston, Kevin Fitzpatrick
vs.
Chris Adams, Lauren Winston, Michael Edwards
► Stipulation: Every third game will be competed under the once-named "secret captains" rule which means if either Winston is eliminated, the round is lost for that entire team [regardless of the number of in-play participants].
BACKGROUND
The predominant rivalry for the ladies began on September 3, 2005, when sisters Valerie and Lauren Winston met at the inaugural
ECD
event in a one-on-one captains match-up. As of August 1, 2011, they have faced an additional four times - 2006's
ONE YEAR ANNIVERSARY
and
Holiday Special
events, the
TWO YEAR ANNIVERSARY
in 2007, and last year's
5 YEAR ANNIVERSARY
- with each winning twice and tying once to bring the score to a deadlocked 2-2-1 draw. A sixth and perhaps final encounter between the two was formally announced on July 16, 2011. They will each be aligned by two male partners of The Writer's choosing.
The other main conflict heading into STAR WARS will see Kevin Fitzpatrick and Justin Pierce team with Valerie to take on Michael Edwards and Chris Adams, who will join Lauren. Several points of interest are noted:
► The Adams-Fitzpatrick rivalry has been well-documented with each battling one another on three separate occasions: the 2006 year-end finale
DODGEBALL 70
, the overtime
CREAMation
thriller
DODGEBALL 105, and late-2007's malicious
DODGEBALL CXV
.
► Edwards and Fitzpatrick will meet for the second time following Edwards' team victory over Fitzpatrick's team at DODGEBALL 100.
► Edwards and Pierce will face each other for the first time ever. They were, however, co-captains at
DODGEBALL 100
in August 2007.
► Despite competing in excess of 140 events individually, Adams and Pierce have never faced in any kind of captains confrontation.
► The Adams-Edwards and Fitzpatrick-Pierce duos will each join forces for the first time after a pair of high-profile matches. Pierce met Fitzpatrick in the inaugural three-vs-three captains encounter at DODGEBALL 100 while Adams battled Edwards at the 4 YEAR ANNIVERSARY, an event held within the 2009 "Adams Era" of
ECD
.
► None of the male co-captains have either faced or teamed with their female counterparts.
STARRING
Adams, Christopher
: Premiere legend, de facto chancellor during the 2009
ECD
era.
Debuted at DODGEBALL DAY 3; Inducted into
ECDElite
Hall of Fame September 11, 2010.
Edwards, Michael
: Iconic crazy man, sole survivor of the dreaded 2006 summer.
Debuted at DODGEBALL 47; Inducted into
ECDElite
Hall of Fame November 27, 2010.
Fitzpatrick, Kevin
: Feared powerhouse, The Writer's top combatant of the modern age.
Debuted at DODGEBALL XTWO; Inducted into
ECDElite
Hall of Fame September 11, 2010.
Pierce, Justin
: Respected court general, multi-time award recipient.
Debuted at DODGEBALL DAY 2; Inducted into
ECDElite
Hall of Fame September 11, 2010.
Winston, Lauren
: Famed framer of
East Coast Dodgeball
.
Debuted at DODGEBALL DAY 1; Inducted into
ECDElite Family
wing of the Hall of Fame, November 27, 2010.
Winston, Valerie
: Famed framer of
East Coast Dodgeball
.
Debuted at DODGEBALL DAY 1; Inducted into
ECDElite Family
wing of the Hall of Fame, November 27, 2010.
SUPPORTING CAST
Adams, Kevin
: 2010
ECDElite
inductee.
Adams, Steve
: 2x season finale headliner.
Basista, Sascha
: FAMILY AFFAIR III headliner.
DiBuccio, Diana
: 2010
ECDElite
inductee.
Jacobs, Kenny
: FAMILY AFFAIR IV headliner.
Katz, Zach
: Future SIX YEAR ANNIVERSARY headliner.
Knott, Rob
: 2011
ECD
photographer.
Librizzi, Kris
: Rookie sensation of 2011.
Lima, Joanice
: Rookie sensation of 2011.
Megill, Kevin
: 2010
ECDElite
inductee.
Mills, Travis
: 2x season finale headliner.
Oberto, Kelly
: Rookie sensation of 2011.
Stopa, Lauren
: 2011
ECDElite
inductee.
Teitelbaum, Jason
: FAMILY AFFAIR II headliner.
Tronolone, John
: 2011
ECDElite
inductee.
Wolf, Justin
: Future SIX YEAR ANNIVERSARY headliner.
Writer, The
: Behind-the-scenes mastermind and events planner of
ECD
.
EXTERNAL LINKS
►
STAR WARS Facebook event page
►
East Coast Dodgeball
Facebook page
body_html:
"For two thousand, one hundred, sixty nine agonizing days,
the East Coast Dodgeball empire has been in a state of civil war."


STAR WARS is the 184th East Coast Dodgeball event produced within the "Tronolone Era." It is scheduled to take place on August 13, 2011 at the Wall High School tennis courts in Wall, New Jersey. There is currently one attraction announced for the event.

  • PRODUCTION
    STAR WARS will feature one main event that involves members of the current East Coast Dodgeball roster from existing rivalries partly initiated by embellished storylines. Dodgeball players will portray as themselves in an intensified manner as they follow through a series of outings that build tension and culminate in a duel, commonly known as a "captains match."

  • SCHEDULED MATCH
    Justin Pierce, Valerie Winston, Kevin Fitzpatrick vs. Chris Adams, Lauren Winston, Michael Edwards
    ► Stipulation: Every third game will be competed under the once-named "secret captains" rule which means if either Winston is eliminated, the round is lost for that entire team [regardless of the number of in-play participants].

  • BACKGROUND
    The predominant rivalry for the ladies began on September 3, 2005, when sisters Valerie and Lauren Winston met at the inaugural ECD event in a one-on-one captains match-up. As of August 1, 2011, they have faced an additional four times - 2006's ONE YEAR ANNIVERSARY and Holiday Special events, the TWO YEAR ANNIVERSARY in 2007, and last year's 5 YEAR ANNIVERSARY - with each winning twice and tying once to bring the score to a deadlocked 2-2-1 draw. A sixth and perhaps final encounter between the two was formally announced on July 16, 2011. They will each be aligned by two male partners of The Writer's choosing.

    The other main conflict heading into STAR WARS will see Kevin Fitzpatrick and Justin Pierce team with Valerie to take on Michael Edwards and Chris Adams, who will join Lauren. Several points of interest are noted:
    ► The Adams-Fitzpatrick rivalry has been well-documented with each battling one another on three separate occasions: the 2006 year-end finale DODGEBALL 70, the overtime CREAMation thriller DODGEBALL 105, and late-2007's malicious DODGEBALL CXV.
    ► Edwards and Fitzpatrick will meet for the second time following Edwards' team victory over Fitzpatrick's team at DODGEBALL 100.
    ► Edwards and Pierce will face each other for the first time ever. They were, however, co-captains at DODGEBALL 100 in August 2007.
    ► Despite competing in excess of 140 events individually, Adams and Pierce have never faced in any kind of captains confrontation.
    ► The Adams-Edwards and Fitzpatrick-Pierce duos will each join forces for the first time after a pair of high-profile matches. Pierce met Fitzpatrick in the inaugural three-vs-three captains encounter at DODGEBALL 100 while Adams battled Edwards at the 4 YEAR ANNIVERSARY, an event held within the 2009 "Adams Era" of ECD.
    ► None of the male co-captains have either faced or teamed with their female counterparts.

  • STARRING
    Adams, Christopher : Premiere legend, de facto chancellor during the 2009 ECD era.
    Debuted at DODGEBALL DAY 3; Inducted into ECDElite Hall of Fame September 11, 2010.
    Edwards, Michael : Iconic crazy man, sole survivor of the dreaded 2006 summer.
    Debuted at DODGEBALL 47; Inducted into ECDElite Hall of Fame November 27, 2010.
    Fitzpatrick, Kevin : Feared powerhouse, The Writer's top combatant of the modern age.
    Debuted at DODGEBALL XTWO; Inducted into ECDElite Hall of Fame September 11, 2010.
    Pierce, Justin : Respected court general, multi-time award recipient.
    Debuted at DODGEBALL DAY 2; Inducted into ECDElite Hall of Fame September 11, 2010.
    Winston, Lauren : Famed framer of East Coast Dodgeball.
    Debuted at DODGEBALL DAY 1; Inducted into ECDElite Family wing of the Hall of Fame, November 27, 2010.
    Winston, Valerie : Famed framer of East Coast Dodgeball.
    Debuted at DODGEBALL DAY 1; Inducted into ECDElite Family wing of the Hall of Fame, November 27, 2010.

  • SUPPORTING CAST
    Adams, Kevin : 2010 ECDElite inductee.
    Adams, Steve : 2x season finale headliner.
    Basista, Sascha : FAMILY AFFAIR III headliner.
    DiBuccio, Diana : 2010 ECDElite inductee.
    Jacobs, Kenny : FAMILY AFFAIR IV headliner.
    Katz, Zach : Future SIX YEAR ANNIVERSARY headliner.
    Knott, Rob : 2011 ECD photographer.
    Librizzi, Kris : Rookie sensation of 2011.
    Lima, Joanice : Rookie sensation of 2011.
    Megill, Kevin : 2010 ECDElite inductee.
    Mills, Travis : 2x season finale headliner.
    Oberto, Kelly : Rookie sensation of 2011.
    Stopa, Lauren : 2011 ECDElite inductee.
    Teitelbaum, Jason : FAMILY AFFAIR II headliner.
    Tronolone, John : 2011 ECDElite inductee.
    Wolf, Justin : Future SIX YEAR ANNIVERSARY headliner.
    Writer, The : Behind-the-scenes mastermind and events planner of ECD.
